IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: IMAGINATION STAGE, INC. INSPIRES CREATIVITY THROUGH THEATRE AND ARTS EDUCATION PROGRAMS THAT CHALLENGE, NURTURE, AND EMPOWER YOUNG PEOPLE OF ALL ABILITIES.
IRS990.MissionDesc: IMAGINATION STAGE, INC. INSPIRES CREATIVITY THROUGH THEATRE AND ARTS EDUCATION PROGRAMS THAT CHALLENGE, NURTURE, AND EMPOWER YOUNG PEOPLE OF ALL ABILITIES.
IRS990.Desc: IMAGINATION STAGE, INC. THE WASHINGTON REGION'S LEADING THEATRE DEDICATED TO CHILDREN, PRESENTS PROGRAMS THAT REFLECT THE INSTITUTION'S DEEP COMMITMENT TO INNOVATION, INCLUSION, DIVERSITY, AND ARTISTRY. THESE PROGRAMS INCLUDE PROFESSIONAL THEATRE PRODUCTIONS, ARTS EDUCATION CLASSES, ACCESS AND INCLUSION.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION FOLLOWS THE AUTHORITATIVE GUIDANCE RELATING TO ACCOUNTING FOR UNCERTAINTY IN INCOME TAXES INCLUDED IN ACCOUNTING STANDARDS CODIFICATION TOPIC 740-10, INCOME TAXES. THESE PROVISIONS PROVIDE CONSISTENT GUIDANCE FOR THE ACCOUNTING FOR UNCERTAINTY IN INCOME TAXES RECOGNIZED IN AN ENTITY'S FINANCIAL STATEMENTS AND PRESCRIBE A THRESHOLD OF "MORE LIKELY THAN NOT" FOR RECOGNITION AND DERECOGNITION OF TAX POSITIONS TAKEN OR EXPECTED TO BE TAKEN IN A TAX RETURN. IT IS THE ORGANIZATION'S POLICY TO RECOGNIZE INTEREST AND/OR PENALTIES RELATED TO UNCERTAIN TAX POSITIONS, IF ANY, IN INCOME TAX EXPENSES. THE ORGANIZATION PERFORMED AN EVALUATION OF UNCERTAIN TAX POSITIONS FOR THE YEARS ENDED AUGUST 31, 2022 AND 2021, AND DETERMINED THAT THERE WERE NO MATTERS THAT WOULD REQUIRE RECOGNITION ON THE CONSOLIDATED FINANCIAL STATEMENTS OR THAT MAY HAVE ANY EFFECT ON ITS TAX-EXEMPT STATUS. THE STATUTE OF LIMITATIONS GENERALLY REMAINS OPEN FOR THREE TAX YEARS WITH THE U.S. FEDERAL JURISDICTION OR THE VARIOUS STATES AND LOCAL JURISDICTIONS IN WHICH THE ORGANIZATION FILES TAX RETURNS.

THE ORGANIZATION RECEIVES APPLICATIONS FOR SCHOLARSHIPS FROM FAMILIES THAT PROVIDED EVIDENCE OF NEED. THOSE APPLICATIONS ARE EVALUATED BY EDUCATION STAFF TO DETERMINE THE LEVEL OF NEED AND THE AMOUNT OF ASSISTANCE. THE SCHOLARSHIPS ARE ONLY PROVIDED FOR THE ORGANIZATION'S PROGRAMS. THEY ARE PROVIDED AS A DISCOUNT ON THE PROGRAMS. THEREFORE, NO FURTHER MONITORING IS REQUIRED.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 4
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE BOARD RECREATED THE MANAGING DIRECTOR ROLE AS A CO-EQUAL CEO TO THE PRODUCING ARTISTIC DIRECTOR (RENAMED ARTISTIC DIRECTOR), SHIFTING THE ORGANIZATION TO A SHARED LEADERSHIP MODEL.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE 990 IS PRESENTED TO THE FINANCE COMMITTEE WHO REVIEWS IT FOR ACCURACY AND REPORTS THEIR FINDINGS TO THE EXECUTIVE COMMITTEE OF THE BOARD.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: ETHICS TRAINING IS PART OF THE FIRST ALL-STAFF MEETING EACH FISCAL YEAR. EMPLOYEES AND BOARD OF DIRECTORS ARE REQUIRED TO DISCLOSE IN WRITING ANY CONFLICTS OF INTEREST WITH SPECIFIC ORGANIZATIONS, INDIVIDUALS, OR FOUNDATIONS. EMPLOYEES SIGN AND AGREE TO ABIDE BY A STRICT CODE OF ETHICS EACH YEAR; THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS SIGNS AND AGREES TO ABIDE BY A CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY WITH FULL-DISCLOSURE REQUIREMENTS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 15
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE BOARD DETERMINES EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR COMPENSATION. FOR OTHER KEY EMPLOYEES AN ANNUAL REVIEW OF COMPENSATION WITH COMPARABLE DATA OF SIMILAR ORGANIZATIONS IS MADE WITH AN ORGANIZATIONAL GOAL OF PARITY RELATIVE TO SIZE, MISSION AND PROGRAMMING WITHIN THE GEOGRAPHIC AREA.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: GOVERNING DOCUMENTS AND CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICIES ARE AVAILABLE UPON REQUEST. FINANCIAL STATEMENTS ARE AVAILABLE ON THEIR WEBSITE (ANNUAL REPORT) AND GUIDESTAR (990) AND UPON REQUEST.
THE PROCESS HAS NOT CHANGED FROM THE PRIOR YEAR.
